name: now
description:
Gets the current date and time of the computer running
 the CFML server.

examples.title: Using Now() in Script
examples.description: Let's display the current server datetime using script.
examples.code: WriteOutput( 'The current date and time is: ' & Now() );
examples.result: The current date and time is: {ts '2014-03-19 15:27:42'}

examples.title: Using Now() in Tagged CFML
examples.description: Let's display the current server datetime using tagged CFML.
examples.result: The current date and time is: {ts '2014-03-19 15:27:42'}
